description: Auditable dispositions for non-actionable Android manifest exported-component findings required by launcher entrypoints.
policy: Only platform-required launcher exports may be dispositioned. Any non-launcher exported component finding must be remediated in manifest code.

entries.reason: Launcher activity includes MAIN/LAUNCHER intent filters and must remain exported for app startup.
entries.cleanupCriteria: Remove this disposition if launcher routing changes and the activity no longer requires MAIN/LAUNCHER export.

entries.reason: Example launcher activity includes MAIN/LAUNCHER intent filters and requires exported visibility for runnable sample behavior.
entries.cleanupCriteria: Remove this disposition when the example launcher entrypoint is replaced or scanner logic recognizes launcher-required exports.

entries.reason: Android SDK example launcher activity includes MAIN/LAUNCHER intent filters and must stay exported to provide an app entrypoint.
entries.cleanupCriteria: Remove this disposition when launcher responsibilities move to another component or scanner recognizes launcher-required exports.
